title: Friends Store
description: The app lets users record, save, update, or delete (CRUD) friends' info in a database and display it on the UI.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Two players take turns marking spaces on a 3x3 grid to get three in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

title: Photo Gallery
description: The app lets users upload and view images, with a modal for better viewing.

title: Google Keep
description: Allows users to create, organize, and store notes

title: Tech Store
description: The app lets users filter products by category and add them to their carts.

title: myTunes
description: Responsive landing page, inspired by the iTunes website's layout and content.
